get.description: get an special task of the application in the cloud

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: the task objectId which you want to get

post.description: add an task which will execute special job at special time

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: task message which you want to create

desc.description: your special name for your current job

jobName.description: the job name of Application definded which task run with

params.description: the params which task will execute job with

startTimestamp.description: the time when job will execute job at,unit is second

interval.description: the interval time of job execute repetitive,default value is -1

post.description: modify an task which will execute special job at special time

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: task objectId which you want to modify

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: job message which you want to modify

desc.description: your special name for your current job

jobName.description: the job name of Application definded

params.description: params which job will execute with

startTimestamp.description: the time when job will execute at,unit is second

interval.description: the interval time of job execute repetitive,default value is -1

200.description: OK,and return the task modified message

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: task objectId which you want to delete

post.description: run an special task right away

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: task objectId which you want to run right away

200.description: OK,and return the status of task running

The Android Push SDK should hold an socket with Marketing Push Server, firstly the SDK get address of Comet which is the Service Node of Marketing Push Server.The address is Array.

parameters.name: k
parameters.description: SDK auto-create an Key which can be to discriminate every client by comet.

get.description: The Android Push SDK will reconnect the comet, and firstly it will get the Offline Messages from Marketing Push Server.

parameters.name: k
parameters.description: SDK auto-create an Key which can be to discriminate every client by comet.

parameters.name: m
parameters.description: Time Series(Get all Offline Messages when m=0).

200.description: the json format of OfflineMessage file

get.description: The Android Push SDK can get the server's time by this API.
